message: I'll take the lion's share, but let's start fair.  You get 10%, I get 90%.  Accept this and we both walk away with something.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn to propose a more balanced split.
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hitting us both, and we're both losing money.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to end this.
You want 50/50? I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away all my chances of getting a better deal.
